ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound carrots, peeled and cut into 3-inch-long pieces

cookingTips: Toss carrots with olive oil and Italian seasoning, then spread on baking sheet
Roast at 400°F for 15 minutes until carrots begin to caramelize
Top with pecan and panko mixture, then roast for another 5-7 minutes until topping is golden and crunchy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the user how to create a textured, elegant side dish by topping roasted carrots with a pecan-panko crust.
